plugin.name: redis
plugin.developers: [[name:Burt Beckwith], [name:Christian Oestreich], [name:Brian Coles], [name:Michael Cameron], [name:John Engelman], [name:David Seiler], [name:Jordon Saardchit], [name:Florian Langenhahn], [name:German Sancho], [name:John Mulhern], [name:Shaun Jurgemeyer]]
plugin.author: Ted Naleid
plugin.description: The Redis plugin provides integration with a Redis datastore. Redis is a lightning fast 'data structure server'. The plugin enables a number of memoization techniques to cache results from complex operations in Redis.
plugin.title: Redis Plugin
plugin.name: redis
